260054.「やあ こんにちは。\n キミも トランプケース希望の お客さんだね？\n ……:
Hey, there. You're the one who wanted the card case, right? Uh... I'd like to introduce myself... My name is Psgol. I'm a member of
the Millionaires Society. I'm Pugol, a member of the Millionaires Society. Have you ever heard of the game "Millionaire"? I'm the one
who brought it to Astoltia. But there are so many additional rules. I'm trying to organize the rules so we can all play together. And
then word spread by word of mouth... We now have a daily tournament called the Dan-level tournament. With different rules for each
day, players compete to see who's the best. You can play with your friends using any rules you like... Anyway, I want you to enjoy
the game. First, please accept this...

260056.「やあ <pc>さん。\n 最近 がんばってるみたいじゃないか。\n<bw_br:
Yo, <pc>! It seems like you've
been working hard lately.
<bw_break>

260057.「やあ <pc>さん。\n ここ最近で いろいろなことがあったぜ。\n<bw_b: Yo! (greeting)<pc> I'm sorry. A lot has happened recently...<bw_break>

260059.「<%sM_RANK>まで 上がったようだから\n 私からのお祝いだ。昇段報酬を:
I see you're up to <%sM_RANK>, so here's my
offer... I'd like to offer you a promotion...<bw_break>

260060.「……っと思ったが だめだ。\n どうぐかばんが いっぱいじゃないか。\n<br:
I thought... I thought so, but... But the glove compartment's full. If you want a reward, you're gonna have to go make some
room in your glove compartment...

260063.「……っと思ったけど ちょっとキミ。\n お金がいっぱいで 持ちきれないみたいだ:
I thought... I thought it was, but it's just... There's so much money in there, they can't hold it all. I'm kind of jealous... If
you want your money back, you're gonna have to cut back. Until then...

260064.「第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦は 終了したぜ。\n もしも ラ:
The <%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>th Dan Championship is
over. If you were ranked higher, I would've
given you something...<bw_break>

260065.「……ってあれ！\n <pc>さん ランクインしてるよ！\n すごいじゃないか。:
... Oh, my God!<pc> You're on the list! That's great. What's your
rank...<bw_break>

260068.<se_nots System 7>\n<pc>は\n賞金 <%nM_AWARD:
<se_nots System 7>
<pc> has received a prize of <%nM_AWARD_GOLD>
gold!<end>

260069.「今は 第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦が 開催中だ。\n エント:
Right now, the <%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>th Dan Championship is in session... I've already registered, so I can enter from the card
case... You are <%sM_RANK> to Star... If you don't understand something, ask for clarification...

260071.「第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦が 開催中だ。\n ここでは 報:
The No. <%dM_EVENT_NUMBER> Championship is underway.
You can view the rewards here.
What do you need today?
<break>

260073.「大富豪決定戦 <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME>が 開催中だ。\n ここで:
The current Tycoon tournament
<%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME> is underway. You can see
the rewards here. What do you want to do?
<break>

260074.「まだ ランキングは 確認できないぜ？\n 始まったばかりだからな。\n<bw_:
I can't check the rankings yet, okay? We're
just getting started...<bw_break>

260075.「段位戦は だいじなものの 中にある\n トランプケースから参加できるぜ。\n:
For the Dan competition, you can join from
the card case inside the main hall... See you
later!<end>

260076.「<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>日に\n 新しいイベントを:
<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>I'm starting a new event on the first... You
can count on me...<end>

260077.「大富豪決定戦 <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME>は\n <tm%nM_TI:
Please keep in mind that the <%sM_SP_EVENT_NAME>
is scheduled to end on <tm%dM_TIME>/<td%dM_TIME> at <th%dM_TIME>:<ti%02dM_TIME> JST.
<end>

260078.「どの説明を 聞きたいんだ？\n 私が 教えてやるよ。\n<break>:
Which explanation do you want to hear? I'll
tell you...<break>

260079.「他にも何か 説明を聞くかい？\n 私が 教えてやるよ。\n<break>:
Do you want me to explain anything else? I
can tell you...<break>

260080.「場に出されたカードよりも 強いカードを出す。\n それが 大富豪の 基本ルール:
A card stronger than the one played. That is the basic rule of the game. According to the rules of the Millionaire's Association, four
players can play the game. There is a ruthless element of luck and a fierce competition between the opponents. It's
addictive, isn't it? If you'd like to know anything else about the game, I've included a description in the card case.

260083.「段位戦には 段位戦ポイントの\n 獲得量を競う ランキングがある。\n 上位に:
Dan ranking is based on the amount of dan
ranking points you earn... If you rank high,
you get a reward...<bw_break>

260084.「トランプポイントを 渡してくれたら\n 私の トランプコレクションの中から\n:
If you give me your playing card points, I will exchange them for any playing cards from my playing card collection... You can get
Trump Points for playing Daifugo in Dan-level tournaments or against your friends... But be careful, because you can get fewer playing
cards points in the fellowship tournament than in the Dan competition. There's also furniture that can be used to play Daifugo,
but you can only get Trump Points for this too...

260857.「なんと！ <%nM_RANKING>位だ！\n これほどの偉業を 成しとげるな:
What a surprise! <%nM_RANKING>! I'm so proud
of you, man!<me 73><bw_break>

260858.「なんと！ <%nM_RANKING>位だ！\n キミは 見かけによらず 大した:
What a surprise! You're number <%nM_RANKING>!
You're a lot more than you look!<me 72><bw_break>

260859.「なんと！ <%nM_RANKING>位だ！\n がんばったじゃないか。\n<m:
What a surprise! <%nM_RANKING>! You worked
hard...<me 71><bw_break>

260860.「これは <%nM_RANK_UPPER>～<%nM_RANK_LOWER>位ま:
This is for players ranked <%nM_RANK_UPPER>
to <%nM_RANK_LOWER>... Take it!<end>

262173.「他にも 用があるなら\n また 話しかけてくれよな。\n<end>:
If there's anything else you need, you can
talk to me...<end>

262174.「そうだ。もう 次の段位戦が\n 始まってるぜ。エントリーしたいなら\n また:
... The next tournament has already
started... If you want to enter, please talk
to me again...<end>

<end>

270348.「大富豪決定戦は 期間限定の大会だ。\n 基本的な遊びは いつもの段位戦と一緒だ:
The Daifugo Championship is a limited time event. The basic game is the same as the usual Dan tournament, but there are a few
differences, so I'll explain... First of all, the rules of the tournament don't change during the tournament. It doesn't change
every day, so be careful... Secondly, in the millionaire's tournament, you play against a special background. You can't use your own
background, but you can enjoy the different atmosphere... Now, as for the ranks, we've divided you into five levels, from D to S. If
you're ranked S, you'll be matched with an advanced player, so keep that in mind... We also have rank achievement rewards and
ranking rewards, so keep playing and aim for the top... Lastly, you can't participate in the regular rankings during the tournament.

272405.「<%sM_RANK>ランクまで 上がったから\n 私からのお祝いだ。ランク達成:
Now that you've hit Rank <%sM_RANK>,
here's a little reward for ya. A Rank
Achievement reward, if you will.
<bw_break>
